website_summaries.verdict: A decent extension cords for indoor use, but limited utility for outdoor use.
pros: Great price, convenient three-outlet design and can be used indoors out outdoors
cons: Lighter duty and construction that other cords rated for outdoor use

customer_reviews.title: For INDOOR use only
customer_reviews.text: Although this is marketed as an indoor/outdoor cord and the cardboard sleeve says it is, it is NOT. Nowhere on the cord itself or attached labeling does it indicate it is for outdoor use. When I inquired, the response from seller was “This cord is for indoor use only”. What a scam! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A Doolin

customer_reviews.title: Horrible cord! Don't buy. Everything falls out of the plug holes
customer_reviews.text: This is the worse extension cord I've ever had. The length was good but the plugs themselves are horrible. The holes are too big and anything you plug in falls out either half way or all the way. I plugged a light in with a typical plug and it doesn't stay securely in which can lead to a fire. I plugged my iPhone charger in and it just completely falls out. Piece of crap. Will be sending back immediately
customer_reviews.author: S. LaMartina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This 3 outlet extention cord works perfectly. The 25 ft cord allowed me to snake it from an easy chair in my bedroom and under a door to the closest outlet in the next room so that I did not have to stretch a cord across the room where it would be unsightly and a possible tripping hazard. The flatness of it, makes it virtually invisible. I now have my own corner of the room where I can put my feet up and read, work on my laptop, or just chill. I am very pleased with this prodcuct and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Francisco

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT for Outdoor Use!
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars if my reason for buying it was for indoor use only. This type of false advertising should NOT be tolerated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had to return the one I bought as it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the one I bought as it didn't work. Plugged it into a known-working outlet, plugged in a known-working appliance, no power. Used my old extension cord, worked perfectly. These things happen, but I'll replace it with another brand and hope it works the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Butch Poodle

customer_reviews.title: It does what it claims.
customer_reviews.text: My old apartment has two wall outlet locations on two sides of the walls, and I needed a long extension cord. Also one of the outlet is located just around my bed, and the headboard is constantly banging it. This flat low profile plug helps to prevent dislodging it.
customer_reviews.author: atagany

customer_reviews.title: Got this for camping - perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I got this for camping. I needed about 25' for power from AC Plug at campsite to tent. This packs smaller than the thick rounded extension cords, yet it decent gauge with ground so it will handle a fair load, and it's OK for temporary use outdoors - I'd not use it permanently. But for camping, it's perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B

customer_reviews.title: Left and Right slots too big
customer_reviews.text: Same problems as others have posted recently. The left and right slots are too big and anything you plug into it just falls back out. Makes this pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cable to outdoor plug-in lights!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased some ready to plug in outdoor spotlights, and needed to run an extension under a carpet at the doorway, as I couldn't dig underneath a 5' sidewalk with the cable. Perfect. It lays flat and you would never know it's there! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these when I needed to run a cord in from the garage and this fits the bill (and the gap above my door) perfectly. Nice and long and it's quite well made.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good cord
customer_reviews.text: Needed an extension cord for a wall mounted HDTV. Living in an apartment where electrical outlets were minimal the cord solved the problem as I was able to run the cord and tack it along two walls to provide power to the set. Also, cord was well made, heavier insulation provided enough to insure the tacks would hold.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C

customer_reviews.title: Okay product, but loose.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a 25 ft long cord with 2 prongs for my dvd player + tv. I live in an older home and have only one outlet in my bedroom. This cord is perfect length, BUT as others have stated these plugs are very loose. I have it propped up against the side of my tv case just right, otherwise the cords would fall right out. any slight movement causes this. Not sure if its just a bad batch or what, but I haven't been able to find a similar 25 ft long product with more than one outlet, so keeping for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Mason

customer_reviews.title: Flat Low profile cord makes this perfect for running along a base board
customer_reviews.text: I like the low flat profile of the cord as i am using this ro power a sub and speakers from one end of a room to another under some wood paneling that sticks out from the wall. If I need another for a similar purpose, it'll be this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie G. Welch III

customer_reviews.title: good cheap cord.
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said the plugs are a bit lose, but for underdesk use its fine. Needed these because of the flat cord to fit under the edge of a desk.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: A lot better than the average 3 outlet cord
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by how nice this was compared to cheap versions you'd normally see in a big box store. Cord is thick, tough and very flexible. The flush angled plug was a nice touch for behind furniture.
customer_reviews.author: E. JacksonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great cord--Bad receptical.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the cord is great except the receptacle end. I tried several two and three prong plugs and the all just fell out. Very loose receptacle. I guess I'll just bend and / or tape the male plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Ostraat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fit the room perfect and is of substantial quality.
customer_reviews.author: 4whirledpeas2

customer_reviews.title: A miracle of science
customer_reviews.text: it's white. It plugs into a wall and has this little thing at the end that allows you to plug other things into it. I can't believe someone actually came up with something like this!

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted an extension cord and now i actually own one. This is so cool. It allows me to us an electric outlet even if my electronic device is not sitting near the outlet.

customer_reviews.title: Mine does not look like it is 25 ft
customer_reviews.text: Worked out of the box. Bee using it for 2 weeks now. Mine does not look like it is 25 ft. Mine is more like 20 ft so make sure to you receiving what you ordered.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The extension cord met my expectations. It served the purpose for which it was purchased. The plug is handily not obtrusive when plugged into the receptacle.

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: It works and it was a good price. I love the flat outlet from the wall so that it can be concealed behind a bookcase or other furniture. The product seems to be fairly high quality.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and theres a 3rd plug on the back of unit.

customer_reviews.title: glad i found this.
customer_reviews.text: High quality &i wanted white to run under our overhang so it would blend in &not be in the way on the ground so i can use the color changing flood lights also from amazon anytime.

customer_reviews.title: A great product. Reasonably priced and works perfect for what ...
customer_reviews.text: A great product. Reasonably priced and works perfect for what I use it for. Arrived on time and in perfect condition. Highly recommend this business to all. Revron

customer_reviews.title: Great cable!
customer_reviews.text: Got this cable to replace a messy garage door cabling problem (3 cables, mismatched, hanging low, etc.). This cable worked perfectly! Highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: They are fine
customer_reviews.text: One of three that I purchased would hold the plug in... I had to wire tie the cords to the extension cord to keep contact. The other two were perfect.. So no clue whay happened.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty heavy for outdoor use.  Very convenient alignment of the outlets.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty heavy for outdoor use. Very convenient alignment of the outlets.

customer_reviews.title: Great extension cords
customer_reviews.text: Cords are long, seem to be good quality. I like that the male end lies flush with the wall and the flat cord can be easily run along door frames and under rugs.

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: The product was used in a cord channel and was easy to manipulate.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I couldn't find an electrical cord this length ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I couldn't find an electrical cord this length in white anywhere in our town. I love the way the cord is flat, it makes it so much easier to tuck into corners and it lays flat against the wall.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality,  thick, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality, thick, and waterproof. I needed something that could extend far in my daughters bathroom for a TV mounted on the wall.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length as I wanted to put it over a ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length as I wanted to put it over a door frame. I like that it has the outlet option of 2 or 3.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice, sleek design
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cable. It is not too heavy or overly bulky. The receptacles are tight so things do not fall out. The flat wall plug is the best, makes putting furniture in front of plugs easier. This is a good choice for a streamlined cord with 3 outlets.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect product for the need. Item was exactly as advertised and delivery was spot on.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great extension cord for a lamp and my andriod tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great extension cord for a lamp and my andriod tablet and radio, while a a location where the nearest outlet is 12 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth r. hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Defective--plugs just fall out of receptacle end!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two cords. The male end that plugs into the wall is fine, but unfortunately, the receptacle ends (all three outlets, front and back on both cords) are WAY too loose. Doesn't grab plug at all (yes, I tried several items). Cords literally will fall out if you tip it over. It's almost like they forgot the "insides"--but they didn't. If you bend your plug (significantly--like maybe 1/4" inward) you can get it to stay in and make an electrical connection, but not all plugs are easy to bend (nor do I want to bend my expensive adapter plugs). A little surprised because of all of the high-ratings. Guess I just got the bad ones. Returning to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as described and precisely what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Slim Design
customer_reviews.text: Great extension cord. Like the slim design very much. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because I use it outdoors and there is no cover for unused outlet plugs(I did not think to look for that when I purchased my extension cord). It would be a nice feature to have for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom 3

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and handy extension cord
customer_reviews.text: Great extension cord..very helpful to have the additional 3 outlet capability.

customer_reviews.title: Very good charger, at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, rectangular shape is such that there is no searching for a sweet spot. Charges equally well in the flat or upright position at either a workstation or nightstand. Will charge horizontally in the upright position so you could watch a video or movie and at least hold the charge you have or gain a bit more.

customer_reviews.title: Plugs fall out of receptacle
customer_reviews.text: The male side of this is fine, gauge is as listed. The receptacle side of it is terrible. The connectors inside the receptacle are not tight. The plugs fall out and lost contact with . It is not limited to certain items. Both 2 prong and 3 prong items do not stay seated. I had to use a velcro tie to get the plugs to stay in. Obviously a pain every time I want to switch a plug.
customer_reviews.author: idranoelac

customer_reviews.title: Plug and outlets are solid and everything plugs in with excellent tolerances.

customer_reviews.text: I like the multiple connections but the gauge is lighter than I expected. pay attention to the gauge if you need to carry high amps.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful so I don't have to worry about being located ...
customer_reviews.text: Very useful so I don't have to worry about being located near a power outlet and can put/use my devices anywhere and still get charged. I have both the 15ft and 25ft extension cords.

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, think cord and it works exactly as intended. Can't complain at all.

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Buy For The Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quality, this cord is solid. It has the flat-style cord instead of the round one (which really doesn't matter), but it has the 90 degree angled plug at the outlet, so if you're looking to put it behind a couch or need it to lay flush with the wall, this is perfect for you. And with a three-outlet head, it definitely becomes useful. Thanks Aurum Cables. Brandon

product_meta.title: Aurum Cables 25 Feet 3 Outlet Extension Cord 16AWG Indoor/Outdoor Use - White - UL Listed
product_meta.description:
Aurum Cables 16/3 AWG Outdoor/Indoor Extension Cord - 25 Feet - White 

Suitable for Indoor and Outdoor Use! 

Home-improvement projects and working outdoors just got so much easier, with this Aurum Cables three outlet extension cord! Ever needed the extra outlet, to add that extra power device or tool, and your thinking twice if you should pull out an extra extension cord? Well here is your answer! With this three outlet extension cord Providing you with up to 3 additional outlets for power distribution, just makes it easy and convenient, letting you add another tool or any other power device right there without pulling out an extra cord! 

Quality Construction 

The Aurum Cables multi outlet extension cord is a 16-gauge with Three additional outlets, consisting of three-prong, grounded for safety, with an accessory loop for hanging or wall mounting for your convenience. Providing highest quality with a Sturdy Long-Lasting Construction, durable vinyl covering insulating and protecting the cord's conducting wires, plus resists moisture, abrasion, and the damaging effects of sunlight, and resistant to extreme temperature which will not crack or deteriorate. 

Right angle plug fits places standard plugs don't, reduces wire damage and allows furniture and appliances to be tight to the wall. 

Specification 

• 16/3 -16Awg with 3 conductors grounded. 
• SPT-3 - Heavier construction than SPT-2. 
• 13A - 125V -1625W 
• UL Listed- meeting the required safety standards. .
feature_bullets: 16-gauge, 3 conductor wire, indoor outdoor power extension cord cable - 25 Feet.
Provides up to 3 additional outlets for power distribution.
Accessory loop for hanging or wall mounting for your convenience, making it easier to store, or even keeping it neat while in use rather than just spread out on the floor and tripping over it.
Flat Plug Extension Cord, with a space saving design, letting you keep furniture against wall safely.
This power extension cord is designed to extend the connection of your wall outlet or any power devices.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars186 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
